Title: Freeport LNG in restart mode after fire system trip causes shutdown
Description: The 15 mtpa Freeport LNG plant in Texas is in the process of restarting operations after a trip in the fire safety system caused a forced shutdown of operations at the facility.
Author: JS

Title: Expanded Deutsche Ostsee LNG terminal receives commissioning cargo
Description: The 10.5 mtpa Deutsche Ostsee LNG terminal in Mukran, Germany has received its commissioning cargo since expanding operations with the deployment of a second floating storage regasification unit.
Author: JS

Title: Palau registry temporarily revokes registration of sanctioned LNG ships linked to Arctic LNG 2
Description: The Palau International Ship Registry has temporarily revoked the registrations of three Palau-flagged LNG ships Pioneer, Asya Energy and Everest Energy that have recently come under US sanctions for their support of Russiaâ€™s sanctioned 19.8 mtpa Arctic LNG 2 project and their involvement in sanction-evading activities.
Author: CK
